snippet.title: Zero Orders Tactics Trailer (OLD)
snippet.description:
Zero Orders Tactics - Turn-based puzzle strategy with manipulations of the battlefield instead of giving orders
https://bit.ly/zot-steam

In this game, units won't obey your orders, but you can manipulate the terrain and unit classes to accomplish your primary mission - protect a convoy of defenseless civilians.

Platforms: PC (Windows), Steam Deck
